# main.ts
export const foo = bar();

# jsr.json
{
  "name": "@scope/foo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "exports": "./main.ts"
}

# output
== /jsr.json ==
{
  "name": "@scope/foo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "exports": "./main.ts"
}

== /main.js ==
export const foo = bar();
//# sourceMappingURL=data:application/json;base64,eyJ2ZXJzaW9uIjozLCJzb3VyY2VzIjpbIm1haW4udHMiXSwibmFtZXMiOltdLCJtYXBwaW5ncyI6IkFBQUEsT0FBTyxNQUFNLE1BQU0sTUFBTSJ9

== /main.ts ==
export const foo = bar();

== /package.json ==
{
  "name": "@jsr/scope__foo",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "homepage": "http://jsr.test/@scope/foo",
  "type": "module",
  "dependencies": {},
  "exports": {
    ".": {
      "default": "./main.js"
    }
  },
  "_jsr_revision": 0
}
